thread.title: Taylor named Big 12 Women's Cross Country Coach of the Year - BYU Athletics - Official Athletics Website - BYU Cougars
thread.title_full: Taylor named Big 12 Women's Cross Country Coach of the Year - BYU Athletics - Official Athletics Website - BYU Cougars

author: Author Mayci Taylor
title: Taylor named Big 12 Women's Cross Country Coach of the Year - BYU Athletics - Official Athletics Website - BYU Cougars
text:
IRVING, Texas — The Big 12 Conference announced [Diljeet Taylor](https://byucougars.com/staff/diljeet-taylor) as the Women's Cross Country Coach of the Year for the second-straight season Thursday afternoon.
During the 2024 season, Taylor led her squad to an NCAA championship, Mountain Region championship and second-straight Big 12 championship. She also coached [Lexy Halladay-Lowry](https://byucougars.com/sports/womens-cross-country/roster/player/lexy-halladay-lowry), [Riley Chamberlain](https://byucougars.com/sports/womens-cross-country/roster/player/riley-chamberlain) and [Carmen Alder](https://byucougars.com/sports/womens-cross-country/roster/player/carmen-alder) to All-America honors. In Taylor's nine years at BYU, she has guided nine women to 19 cross country All-America awards.
Taylor was also named [NCAA Mountain Region Coach of the Year](https://byucougars.com/news/2024/11/26/taylor-named-mountain-region-womens-cross-country-coach-of-the-year) for the third time (2019 & 2020-21, 2024) and [NCAA Women's National Coach of the Year ](https://byucougars.com/news/2024/12/2/taylor-named-ncaa-womens-national-coach-of-the-year)for the second time (2020-21, 2024).
"What sets Coach T apart as one of the best coaches in the nation is her incredible ability and genuine willingness to be in the trenches with her team," said senior captain Halladay-Lowry. "She consistently checks in with each of us, ensuring we’re not only doing okay, but thriving both as athletes and individuals. She’s deeply committed to our goals, treating our dreams and ambitions as if they were her own. Her dedication inspires us to give our very best every day."
Up Next
Taylor's distance women will open up the 2025 indoor track season at the Boston Sharon Colyear-Danville Season Opener Dec. 7.
